 
{{Server function}}
{{New items|3.014|1.4|
This function sets a new unban time of a given [[/ban.md|ban]] using unix timestamp (seconds since Jan 01 1970).
}}

==Syntax== 
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
bool setUnbanTime( ban theBan, int theTime )
</syntaxhighlight> 

===Required Arguments=== 
*'''theBan:''' The [[/ban.md|ban]] of which to change the unban time of
*'''theTime:''' the new unban time

===Returns===
Returns ''true'' if changed successfully, ''false'' otherwise.

==Example==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
addCommandHandler("banMe",
function (player)
local ban = banPlayer(player)
setUnbanTime(ban, 500)
end
)

</syntaxhighlight>
